bookTitle: Fushigi Yûgi: The Mysterious Play, Vol. 1: Priestess
Plot: When best friends Miaka and Yui open the pages of an ancient Chinese book, they are transported into the Universe of the Four Gods, a parallel world to ancient China. Now, to escape schoolwork and family problems, Miaka flees to the parallel world, only to find a lot more danger and romance than she bargained for.
Characters: Miaka Yûki, Yui Hongo, Tamahome, Hotohori, Nuriko
